DataElement.preferredName: Body Region Separate Primary Neoplasm Lymph Node Removed Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response of Yes/No/Not Applicable/Unknown that indicates if lymph nodes in a body compartment separate from the tumor were removed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Body Region Separate Primary Neoplasm Lymph Node Removed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Named areas of the body._Independent; not united or joint._A tumor at the original site of origin._A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection._Taken out of, separated from, or eliminated.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Body Region Separate Primary Neoplasm Lymph Node
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Named areas of the body.:Independent; not united or joint.:A tumor at the original site of origin.:A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.

Concepts.definition: A tumor at the original site of origin.

A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.

Property.preferredDefinition: Removed; taken out of or separated from.

Concepts.definition: Taken out of, separated from, or eliminated.
